message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. This is a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. $12,000 is still a bit out of my budget.  I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Let me know if you're interested.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's make a deal!
Alice, I appreciate you moving closer to my price, but $10,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $9,500. Let's split the difference and get this done.

Bob, I understand you're trying to negotiate, but $9,500 is still too low. I'm willing to come down a bit more, but only to $10,000.  This is my final offer, let me know if you're ready to close the deal.
Alice,  $10,000 is still a bit high for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9,750. This is a fair compromise considering where we both started. Let me know if you're ready to make a deal.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $9,750 is still too low for me.  I'm willing to meet you at $9,900. This is my final offer before I move on to other potential buyers.
